resources.string: Elden Ring is an action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game was directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki and made in collaboration with fantasy novelist George R. R. Martin, who provided material for the game\'s setting.
INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
